entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
